mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Employee (emp_name, conv_seq, birth_date, gender, phone_number, hire_date, salary) VALUES (#{empName}, #{convSeq}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{phoneNumber}, #{hireDate}, #{salary})
mapper.select: SELECT e.employee_seq AS employeeSeq, c.branch_name AS branchName, e.emp_name AS empName, e.birth_date AS birthDate, e.gender AS gender, e.phone_number AS phoneNumber, e.hire_date AS hireDate, e.termination_date AS terminationDate, e.salary AS salary FROM Employee e JOIN Convenience c ON e.conv_seq = c.conv_seq WHERE emp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{empName}, '%') and c.conv_seq = #{convSeq}
